channel.title: Home on CDS Policy Team Repository
channel.description: Recent content in Home on CDS Policy Team Repository

item.title: About
item.description: CDS’s mission is to change government to serve people better. The Policy team supports this mission by helping product teams, communities, and leadership at CDS navigate government processes, overcome barriers, and work as effectively as possible. Who we are John Millons (head of policy) John Kenney Lucas Cherkewski Michael Karlin Sam Burton Sarah Hobson Sean Boots What we do Our work tends to cover three main areas: CDS delivery: Serving on CDS product teams to help navigate government rules, processes or overcome barriers Scaling delivery: Sharing what works and what doesn’t based on delivery experience, to inform policy-making and enable others to work more effectively towards digital service delivery.

item.title: Publications
item.description: The documents below are listed by year that they were completed. You can see additional metadata and print documents by following the links below: 2019 Description Date completed Delivering digital services by 2025 Summary: Canadians expect digital services that reflect the Internet era. Concrete, bold actions will help us meet those expectations. We look forward to developing this roadmap together with all of you.
